analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0xb6ca1f1126a9d9a0a4d03e3c8800290a4c88eea1.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xb6ca1f1126a9d9a0a4d03e3c8800290a4c88eea1.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
